definition: to suspend/to hang up/to hang a person
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: You'll also learn innovative ways to prevent callers from wandering off the topic, and who calls back if you're disconnected;
sentences.chinese: 同時學習用創新的方式防止呼叫者跑題和電話吊線。
